channel.title: Question
channel.description: Hi there, I have just got MoparScape with Aryan and it comes with HybridScape. I was just searching through the item id list in "all_IDs" folder and it said Dragon 2H sword. It wouldn't let me use ::pickup so i used ::item 7158 and it got put onto the floor, It looked so cool. But when I tried to pick it up, it froze and logged me out with an exception. How would I get one in my inventory?

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Was it an exception in the client or in the server?

Try the ::pickup <item #> command and see if it still freezes may be a problem with picking up items in the server.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @leet0x leet0x
item.description:
@leet0x wrote:

S’pose so. Coz jagex haven’t finished it probably.

Read full topic

item.title: Question
item.dc:creator: @_devil_666 (devil)666
item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

dragon 2 hander could be bugged thats why it froze when you tried to pick it up? just a suggestion

Read full topic
